Features

Keyword Magic Tool

Keyword Magic Tool

Harness the strength of a database with over 26 billion keywords. Quickly find new ranking opportunities and dive into market trends with AI-powered personalized metrics.

Try It Free
Take a Deep Dive into Any Topic
Find all of the best keyword opportunities for your site, powered by AI.
Keyword Difficulty

Use our advanced keyword difficulty and PKD analysis. Get detailed insights on domains, SERP features, and backlinks.

Intent

Identify keywords that match your goals. Review keyword intent.

Search Volume

Review the average monthly searches for a keyword over a 12-month period to find the most relevant queries.

Trend

Monitor the level of interest in a search query and see how often a keyword has been Googled over the past 12 months.

Cost Per Click

Discover the average CPC for ads tied to your target keywords to budget PPC campaigns.

SERP Features

Assess if your website can secure SERP features for targeted keywords and identify potential rich results.

Pick the most valuable keywords and create a powerful, personalized master list.
Try It Free
Conduct Research with One of the Market's Largest Databases
Explore an AI-enhanced database for comprehensive keyword research. Use domain-specific metrics and filters to refine your strategy and create custom tailored keyword lists.
26.1B
keywords
20M
ideas for a single keyword
142
geo databases
Cluster Your Keywords
Explore Keyword Groups to Plan Your Strategy

Assess each subtopic’s search volume and average difficulty to fine-tune your strategies.

Try It Free
Expand Your Keyword Lists

Discover related keywords to identify less competitive long-tail phrases with high click-through potential.

Try It Free
Save All Your Keywords in One Place
Streamline your keyword strategy by consolidating your lists across Semrush tools or other platforms. Plan both paid advertising campaigns and content strategy, using keyword insights to maximize marketing efforts.
Save, Manage, and Export Your Master Lists

Maximize your keyword research efforts. Export lists to a spreadsheet or our Keyword Strategy Builder, where you can plan a content strategy.

Try It Free
See Why Professionals Across Industries Love Semrush’s Keyword Magic Tool
Find keywords, analyze their potential, and estimate their traffic
Start Searching
